channel.title: Why is this community so 'dead'?
channel.description: We seriously need to get more members to visit this side of the forums. I personally would love to use these boards, but seeing as it's so empty, I really don't see a point.

item.title: Why is this community so 'dead'?
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

isn’t it obvious? the tiny amount of game developers active on the mopar(scape|isthebest) forums was an obscure target right from the start. this forum would probably have been better off in the long run as a subboard on mscp. i think you also have to remember that the surge of game development posts in mscp’s programming section were from people learning to program and just tried their hand at making a one-off game, rather than being fairly dedicated game developers.

Read full topic

item.title: Why is this community so 'dead'?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Well we were HOPING the competitions would be a sort of big thing to get people away from servers and venture into more fun stuff. Basically the forum was just to help as many people get into game development as possible, with the competitions. Between competitions we expected people to be asking questions, teaming up, throwing around ideas but it turns out most 9-12 year old moparscapers just want to kick a ball around in their front yard.

Speaking of, wheres the redir board mitb was going to put on mscp? :o

Read full topic

item.title: Why is this community so 'dead'?
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:2, topic:436407”]Because most of the people who know how to make games just hang around Moparisthebest. Pretty much everyone from here is from MoparScape, and they focus their time on private servers, not games. This forum targets a very small audience.[/quote]Ah I see. Pretty unfortunate in my oppinion.
